subject: PGA Championship
Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: For about 100 American players, the P.G.A. Championship is the last chance to earn a spot on the Ryder Cup team, which begins in Ireland next month.
snippet: For about 100 American players, the P.G.A. Championship is the last chance to earn a spot on the Ryder Cup team, which begins in Ireland next month.
